title: Tiled Tileset Transformations
description: Schema for allowed transformations for tiles within a tileset.

hflip.description: Indicates whether tiles can be flipped horizontally.

vflip.description: Indicates whether tiles can be flipped vertically.

rotate.description: Indicates whether tiles can be rotated in 90-degree increments.

preferuntransformed.description: Indicates whether untransformed tiles remain preferred, or if transformed tiles are used to produce more variations.
